Twitter has gone into meltdown over the appearance of a wife who has stood by her paedophile husband. 
Gary Gibson, who once took on foster children, admits he has been aroused by girls as young as six for more than 50 years . 
The 65-year-old told viewers last week that he had "maybe" done "some things I shouldn't have done", but has never had sexual intercourse with a child . 
Following the massive response to Gary's appearance, This Morning invited his wife, Tabitha Abel, onto the show to discuss her decision to remain supportive of her partner. Tabitha appeared to discuss her husband's attraction (Photo: ITV) Phillip and Holly grilled her on why she stuck by her husband (Photo: ITV) 
She explained: "My background is a midwife. And really, nothing is said by patients by families that is going to shock you. 
"He assured me that he has done nothing. I believe this was the truth. I realise people can lie. However, I was assure by him. But that he had that attraction." Read More Good Morning Britain viewers slam shocking proposals to charge overweight passengers MORE to fly 
"He assured me he is not a child molestor. People are stuck on the idea that being a paedophile makes you a molester." 
Despite her belief that her husband hasn't acted on his attraction, Phillip Schofield suggested that many "find an outlet" to their attraction. She's refused to disown Gary (Photo: ITV) He's admitted that he wants to seek help (Photo: ITV) 
Tabitha responded: "For his part, porn is not of any interest to him. Whether he is aroused while out shopping, that might be the case. But there is a difference between an attraction, and an action." 
"What do you suggest society should do," asked Phillip. "He says he is a virtuous paedophile. Can he teach others not to act?" 
The former nurse, who met her spouse via a Christian singles dating site in 2004, went on to add that there should be more help out there for people who realise they hold such attractions. Read More THAT video of Nicola McLean's husband Tom Williams flirting with another woman at Vegas club resurfaces following her boozy CBB antics 
Gary, who has three children and 10 grandchildren, has admitted he has "struggled" with his feelings towards underage girls as he aged. 
"There are many councillors who will work with people like this who are seeking help. Many of these are young kids who are exploring their sexuality and are horrified to find they're attracted to children. These young people need help," she added. Some viewers slammed her for supporting her husband (Photo: ITV) 
Viewers were quick to slam the woman for standing by her husband, especially when it was claimed he HAD engaged in sexual activity with children when he was 12 years old. 
"How is that woman sitting there so calmly and saying that her husband is attracted to little girls and admits he's a peadophile #thismorning," wrote one viewer. The couple met in 2004 (Photo: ITV) 
"An attraction is different?! She's disgusting. Her and her husband want locking up. Absolutely horrific #thismorning @Schofe @hollywills," insisted a second tweeter. 
Expert Mark Williams Thomas shared his view following the interview, and suggested that there are some treatment programs that can work for people like Gary who want to seek help. 
"There are people out there who have a sexual attraction and don't act on it. What you have to do is reduce the access and opportunity. Some treatment programs do work, "he explained. Like us on Facebook
